title: How to get alistar/garen free skins?
body: Can you help me get Alistar/Garen skins?

replies.body: [Tristana ](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends)can be obtained through the Facebook promotion, and [Alistar ](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc)by following Riot Games on Youtube.  If you run into any trouble, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to assist individually!

if i'm reading this right he asked for garen, not tristana ;) Garen as far i remember by following the twitter account from league of legends of your server i guess. i don't have twitter so i jsut own the alistar and tristana skin.
Woops, thanks!  Aye, [Garen ](http://woobox.com/scrx56)can also be obtained through twitter.  Just the same, hit us up in a ticket if there are any issues.
